snippet: On Monday, when he declares his presidential campaign, he will encounter a crowded field of rivals, many of them with deeper resumes, higher profiles and bigger campaigns.
abstract: Sen Marco Rubio's expected announcement about his intention to run for Republican nomination in 2016 presidential race will be boldest gamble in career filled with political bets taken on long odds.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and ASHLEY PARKER

lead_paragraph: On Monday, when he declares his presidential campaign, he will encounter a crowded field of rivals, many of them with deeper resumes, higher profiles and bigger campaigns.

headline.main: Marco Rubio Builds Political Career on Defying Establishment and Odds
headline.print_headline: History of Underdog Victories Primes Rubio to Announce 2016 Run
